FSLogix Setting/Test:
FSLogix Cleanup Invalid Sessions-Both Containers

CleanupInvalidSessions


HKLM\SOFTWARE\FSLogix\Profiles

In cases where a user's session terminates abruptly- the VHD(x) mounted for the user's profile is not properly detached and the user's next login may not successfully attach their VHD(x) container. FSLogix Setting/Test:
FSLogix Profile Type (Profile Container)

ProfileType


HKLM\SOFTWARE\FSLogix\Profiles

Module checks if FSLogix for host pools is configured to handle concurrent user sessions on the same machine. However it depends on the server.
HB-Multisession-Standard:
Value:3
Expected: 0
HB-Multisession-IT:
Value:3
Expected: 0
HB-Multisession-Frontline-W11:
Value:3
Expected: 0
HB-Multisession-Frontline:
Value:3
Expected: 0
HB-INTUNE-Test:
Value:3
Expected: 0
HB-AVD-W11:
Value:3
Expected: 0
HB-AVD-Trusteer-W11:
Value:3
Expected: 0
EngineeringTest:
Value:3
Expected: 0
Test Details:
Remark:Profile Container Profile Type configured is NOT normal for all host pools.
Impact:Profile Type must be configured with normal behaviour if Concurrent user sessions are not in use for Profile Container. However remember Microsoft OneDrive does not support Concurrent connections.
Recommendation:Please check if Concurrent user sessions are allowed in host pools then ProfileType must be configured and should be set to 3. OneDrive does not support concorrent connections.

FSLogix Locked Retry Interval (Profile Container)

LockedRetryInterval


HKLM\SOFTWARE\FSLogix\Profiles

Module checks the number of seconds to wait between retries - set by LockedRetryCount above.

Not Set
Default: 5 seconds
Expected: 10
HB-Multisession-IT:
Not Set
Default: 5 seconds
Expected: 10
HB-Multisession-Frontline-W11:
Not Set

Not Set

Remark:Locked Retry Interval is not configured correctly or not found.
Impact:A Session Host will wait for X seconds before retrying the operation to connect to VHD(X). Specify a higher value will avoid race conditions in which FSLogix Service will consume more resources on the session host.
Recommendation:It is recommended to set a value of 20 seconds to ensure retry attempts are made gradually. Please configure this registry entry in the Golden Image.

FSLogix Setting/Test:
FSLogix Prevent Login With Failure Setting (Profile Container)

PreventLoginWithFailure


HKLM\SOFTWARE\FSLogix\Profiles

Module checks if user is prevented login when a failure occurs while attaching an FSLogix container.
HB-Multisession-Standard:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-Multisession-IT:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-Multisession-Frontline-W11:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-Multisession-Frontline:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-INTUNE-Test:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-AVD-W11:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-AVD-Trusteer-W11:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
EngineeringTest:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
Test Details:
Remark:Prevent Login With Failure Entry is not configured correctly or not found.
Impact:FSLogix will load FRXShell if there's a failure attaching to or using an existing profile from File Share. The user will receive the FRXShell prompt - default prompt to call support and the users only option will be to sign out. If setting is disabled FSLogix will allow login and user will use a temporary profile which may result in data loss.
Recommendation:It is recommended to enable Prevent Login With Failure setting to allow users to only use profile from Profile Share. Please configure this registry entry in Golden Image.

FSLogix Setting/Test:
FSLogix Prevent Login With Temp Profile Setting (Profile Container)

PreventLoginWithTempProfile


HKLM\SOFTWARE\FSLogix\Profiles

Module checks if user is prevented login when a user receives a temporary Windows profile.
HB-Multisession-Standard:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-Multisession-IT:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-Multisession-Frontline-W11:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-Multisession-Frontline:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-INTUNE-Test:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-AVD-W11:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
HB-AVD-Trusteer-W11:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
EngineeringTest:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
Test Details:
Remark:Prevent Login With Temp Profile Entry is not configured correctly or not found.
Impact:If setting is disabled FSLogix will allow login with a Temp Profile which is not recommended. This may result in data loss if a user continues to use Temp Profile as data will be saved locally and not on Profile Share.
Recommendation:It is recommended to enable Prevent Login With Temp Profile setting to allow users to only use profile from Profile Share and avoid data loss if Temp Profiles are deleted or when Host Pool is re-imaged.

FSLogix Prevent Login With Failure Setting (Office Container)

PreventLoginWithFailure

Not Set

Not Set

Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
EngineeringTest:
Not Set
Default: Not Prevented
Expected: 1
Test Details:
Remark:Prevent Login With Failure Entry is not configured correctly or not found.
Impact:FSLogix will load FRXShell if there's a failure attaching to or using an existing profile VHD(X). The user will receive the FRXShell prompt - default prompt to call support and the users only option will be to sign out. If setting is disabled FSLogix will allow login and user will use a temporary profile which may result in data loss.
Recommendation:It is recommended to enable Prevent Login With Failure setting to allow users to only use profile from Profile Share.

Recommendation:It is recommended to enable Prevent Login With Temp Profile setting to allow users to only use profile from Profile Share and avoid data loss if Temp Profiles are deleted or when Host Pool is re-imaged.

Impact:In rare cases duplicate OST files are created for users. Over long periods of time duplicate OST files may consume incremental disk space.
Recommendation:It is recommended to configured setting to remove duplicate OST files from user profiles.

IncludeTeams

Test Details:
Remark:Office Teams data redirection setting is NOT configured to enable Teams redirection.
Impact:If you configure Teams Redirection the data will be redirected to User Session and user will not need to sign in to teams. However configuring this registry settings will disable teams exclusions.
Recommendation:It is recommended to configure Teams Redirection setting and set it to 0 so Teams exclusions can apply from redirection.xml. There are two options; configure Teams Data redirection so users do not have to sign in again or reduce the size of profile by disabling Teams Redirection.

FSLogix Setting/Test:
FSLogix Sync OST To VHD Setting (Office Container)

MirrorLocalOSTToVHD


HKLM\SOFTWARE\FSLogix\ODFC

Module checks to see if FSLogix is configured to sync existing local OST file to VHD when new VHD is created.
HB-Multisession-Standard:
Not Set
Default: 0: Do nothing with an existing OST file
Expected: 1
HB-Multisession-IT:
Not Set
Default: 0: Do nothing with an existing OST file
Expected: 1
HB-Multisession-Frontline-W11:
Not Set
Default: 0: Do nothing with an existing OST file
Expected: 1
HB-Multisession-Frontline:
Not Set
Default: 0: Do nothing with an existing OST file
Expected: 1
HB-INTUNE-Test:
Not Set
Default: 0: Do nothing with an existing OST file
Expected: 1
HB-AVD-W11:
Not Set
Default: 0: Do nothing with an existing OST file
Expected: 1
HB-AVD-Trusteer-W11:
Not Set
Default: 0: Do nothing with an existing OST file
Expected: 1
EngineeringTest:
Not Set
Default: 0: Do nothing with an existing OST file
Expected: 1
Test Details:
Remark:Sync OST To VHD Setting is configured.
Impact:If you enable this setting the local OST data will be merged to new VHD file. In a clean environment this setting is unnecessary however if the user's profile already contains an OST this setting can be used to migrate the OST into the Office Container. Please note: this will only affect the user's first session when the Office Container is created and the OST is copied or moved to the container.
Recommendation:It is recommended to disable this setting to ensure user is always using OST configured on the user profiles.
